A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a horrible way to end Luke's story. For 40 years I've waited to see Jedi Master Luke Skywalker kick some Sith ass. And all we get is a hologram distraction and a puff of smoke as he concentrated himself to death. Don't get me started on the waste of Leia. Oh *now* she decided to use the Force? Not to save someone or do something noble\, but just to save her own ass? And Holdo couldn't just hit auto-pilot? Or hell\, get 3PO to man the ship? Or an R2 unit? The casino run was a complete waste of space\, and OMG what a waste of Benecio's talent. And Snoke? He can whip Rey's ass around the room like a rag doll\, can connect Kylo and Rey's through Force Skype\, but can't tell that Kylo is bullshitting him? Ugh. At least I can't just blame George Lucas for ruining Star Wars now. Thanks\, Mickey.
